rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0001
rows.name:
There was a whopping huge explosion
over towards the World Tree. You got
out of there all right, I hope?

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Not once have I ever thought I was
lucky to be serving here in Trigo.

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I know my home's in an unprecedented
situation, but what good's one measly
soldier going to do?

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0004
rows.name:
At the very least, I have to try and help
out the refugees who fled here...

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0005
rows.name:
...Wait, Special Inquisitor Meleph?!
I'd never have thought...

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Don't tell me...must be to check
on the wellbeing of the troops?!
Ohh, there is no greater honor!

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Ah, if only you were my immediate
superior, it would be so much easier
to motivate myself to keep working...
